overview: The gangbang gets a shove in the right direction in Doug Jeffries' "Manhandled: A Latino Gangbang." One big difference here is the object, the "bang-ee," isn't introduced until the action is well underway. Drew Peters, that cute blond boy-toy, is the center of attention once the gangbang gets going, sits out the first part, an orgy among the Latino "bang-ers." You could say that the whole thing could be divided into two parts: B.D. (Before Drew), and A.D. (After Drew).
title: Manhandled: A Latino Gangbang
